meta.scene_intent: Grand medieval fantasy crafting workshop — a master dwarven blacksmith's sanctum where martial and arcane craftsmanship converge. This image is shown when a player initiates crafting decisions. It must convey the pride of creation, the marriage of fire and magic, and the promise of legendary equipment being forged.

usp_core: Reference: WoW Ironforge forge district concept art and Blizzard cinematic smithing sequences
Rendering: high-end digital matte painting with visible oil-paint brushstrokes, heavy impasto on metal and flame surfaces
CK2 framing: interior narrative illustration, warm and industrious, conveying a workspace of legendary craftsmanship
Tone: reverent industriousness — this is a sacred space where masterwork weapons and enchanted armour are born
style_bible.look: hyper-detailed digital matte painting, visible oil brushstrokes, atmospheric perspective, concept art quality matching Blizzard cinematics team, painterly realism with fantasy elements, rich texture layering, dramatic interplay of forge-fire warmth and arcane cool luminescence

art_references: Joseph Wright of Derby — An Iron Forge (chiaroscuro mastery, forge lighting on human figures)
Blizzard Entertainment — WoW Ironforge interior concept art (dwarven craftsmanship aesthetic)
Rembrandt van Rijn — The Night Watch (dramatic interior lighting, warm-cool interplay)
John Howe — Tolkien dwarven forge illustrations (fantasy industrial grandeur, material authenticity)

environment.space: A vast vaulted stone workshop carved into the heart of a mountain, the ceiling lost in smoke and shadow twenty metres above. The room is roughly fifteen metres wide and twenty deep, divided into three distinct working zones: the forge proper on the left with its massive stone hearth and chimney, the enchanting station at centre-rear on a raised stone platform, and the alchemy corner on the right with shelves of glowing potions. The walls are dressed stone — granite blocks fitted without mortar in the dwarven fashion — hung with an arsenal of finished and in-progress weapons, shields, and armour pieces. A central stone-and-iron anvil stands on a raised circular dais, the focal point where all three disciplines converge.
environment.foreground: The master anvil dominates the foreground — a massive block of dark meteoric iron set on a carved granite pedestal inscribed with dwarven runes that glow faintly orange from internal heat. On its surface, a half-forged longsword blade glows white-orange, fresh from the furnace. Scattered around the anvil's base: heavy tongs, a selection of hammers ranging from delicate jeweller's tools to a massive two-handed sledge, metal filings that glint like gold dust, quenching troughs of dark water with steam wisping upward, and a leather apron draped over a stool.
environment.midground: Left: the great forge — an enormous stone hearth four metres wide with bellows the size of a horse, operated by chains and gears. The coals within burn white-hot, casting intense orange light. Iron ingots are stacked in neat rows beside it. A weapons rack holds six completed swords, each distinctly different in design. Centre-rear, elevated on a three-step stone platform: an enchanting table of polished dark wood covered in an indigo cloth embroidered with silver constellations. A large open grimoire floats slightly above the table surface, its pages turning slowly by themselves. Purple-violet arcane runes orbit the table in slow concentric circles, casting alien light on the stone walls. Crystal phials of enchanting dust glow in a rack beside it. Right: the alchemy station — floor-to-ceiling wooden shelving crammed with hundreds of glass bottles, flasks, and vials containing liquids in every colour: emerald green, ruby red, sapphire blue, molten gold, midnight black. A copper distillation apparatus with coiled tubes sits on a lower bench, a blue flame beneath a glass retort producing slow bubbling teal liquid. Bundles of dried herbs hang from the ceiling beams.
environment.background: The rear wall is dominated by a huge stone relief carved in dwarven style — depicting Khaz'goroth the Titan Shaper at his cosmic forge, hammering stars into existence. The carving is partially obscured by the enchanting table's arcane light. High narrow windows cut into the stone wall allow thin shafts of pale daylight to penetrate the smoke, creating visible light beams in the hazy air. Iron chains and pulleys hang from the vaulted ceiling for moving heavy materials.
environment.atmosphere: Sacred industriousness — the concentrated hush of a master at work. Heat, metal tang, ozone from arcane energy, herbal sharpness from alchemy ingredients. The room hums with latent power. Every surface speaks of centuries of accumulated craft knowledge.
environment.weather: Interior scene — no weather. The air is hot and thick near the forge, cooler and tinged with ozone near the enchanting table, fragrant and humid near the alchemy station. Smoke and steam layer the upper air.
environment.time_of_day: Indeterminate — deep interior lit primarily by forge-fire and magical sources. The thin daylight shafts from high windows suggest midday outside.

subjects.details: A powerfully built dwarven male, approximately 1.4m tall but immensely broad-shouldered, with arms like tree trunks. His skin is ruddy and weathered, tanned dark by decades of forge heat. A magnificent braided black beard reaches to his waist, the ends capped with small iron rings. He wears a heavy leather apron over a sleeveless chain mail shirt, exposing arms covered in old burn scars and runic tattoos that glow faintly amber. He grips a master smithing hammer in his right hand — a tool of exquisite craftsmanship itself, its head engraved with geometric patterns. His left hand holds the glowing blade on the anvil with long tongs. His expression is one of absolute focused concentration — brow furrowed, eyes narrowed, lips pressed tight. Sweat beads on his forehead, reflecting the forge light. Heavy iron-toed boots, a thick leather belt hung with smaller tools — chisels, files, a measuring caliper.
subjects.scale: Primary subject, positioned at the anvil in the foreground, his body lit dramatically by the forge on one side and the enchanting glow on the other

subjects.element: The enchanting grimoire and arcane apparatus
subjects.details: The floating grimoire is bound in dark purple leather with silver corner clasps shaped like dragon claws. Its yellowed pages are covered in dense arcane script that shifts and rearranges itself. The orbiting runes are three-dimensional — geometric shapes of solid purple-violet light rotating in two concentric rings around the table. Small motes of enchanting dust drift upward from open crystal phials like reverse snowfall. The enchanting table itself bears scorch marks and crystalline residue from past enchantments.
subjects.scale: Background-midground element on the raised platform, visually prominent due to its supernatural light output

subjects.details: Hundreds of glass vessels of varying shapes — round-bottomed flasks, tall narrow vials, wide-mouthed jars with cork stoppers, crystal decanters. Each contains a distinctly coloured liquid, many glowing with their own internal light. Labels in cramped handwriting are tied to many with string. The distillation apparatus is an intricate assembly of copper coils, glass tubes, and ceramic joints, actively processing — teal liquid dripping slowly into a collection flask. A mortar and pestle sit nearby with crushed iridescent herbs. A small cauldron gently bubbles over a contained blue alchemical flame.
subjects.scale: Right-side background element, visually rich and dense with colour, providing visual counterweight to the forge on the left

camera.shot_type: Medium-wide interior shot — plan moyen-large capturing the full workshop from a slightly elevated vantage
camera.angle: Slight high angle (8-10 degrees) looking down at the anvil and craftsman, allowing the viewer to see the layout of all three workshop zones
camera.lens_equivalent: 32mm — moderate wide angle to capture the expansive interior without excessive barrel distortion
camera.focal_point: The glowing blade on the anvil and the craftsman's concentrated face — the moment of creation
camera.depth_of_field: Moderate depth of field — the anvil and craftsman tack-sharp, the enchanting table and alchemy station slightly softer but fully legible, the rear wall relief soft
composition_rules: Rule of thirds: the anvil and craftsman occupy the lower-left intersection point
Triangular composition: forge (left), enchanting table (centre-rear), alchemy station (right) form a triangle of light sources
The glowing blade creates a strong horizontal leading line across the lower third
Vertical emphasis from the forge chimney and the hanging chains creates framing columns
Colour zones: warm reds/oranges left, cool purples centre, teals/greens right — a natural triptych

lighting.key_light: Intense forge-fire light (2200K deep orange) from the great hearth on the left, casting powerful warm directional light across the craftsman and anvil, creating deep chiaroscuro on every surface
lighting.fill_light: Purple-violet arcane glow (420nm) from the enchanting table's orbiting runes, providing cool fill light from the centre-rear, creating striking complementary colour contrast with the forge warmth on shared surfaces
accent_lights: White-orange incandescence from the blade being forged — the brightest point in the image, almost overexposed, casting its own local light on the craftsman's face and hands
Teal-cyan alchemical glow from the potion collection on the right — dozens of small individual light sources creating a jewel-like display
Thin shafts of pale daylight from high windows cutting through the smoky upper air — visible volumetric beams
Faint amber glow from the dwarven runes on the anvil pedestal and the craftsman's arm tattoos
lighting.shadows: Dramatic and complex with multiple coloured light sources. The craftsman casts a massive shadow on the rear wall, distorted by the low forge-light angle. The enchanting table runes cast slowly rotating purple shadows. Deep black pools of shadow in the ceiling vault and between the shelving units. The interplay of orange and purple light creates zones of rich brown where they mix.
atmospheric_fx: Forge smoke: thick grey-orange smoke rising from the hearth, pooling under the vaulted ceiling in visible layers
Sparks: a shower of golden sparks frozen mid-flight from the hammer's last strike on the blade, arcing in parabolic trails
Steam wisps: thin streams of white steam rising from the quenching troughs near the anvil
Arcane motes: purple-white particles drifting upward from the enchanting table like luminous embers in reverse
Alchemy vapours: faint coloured wisps (green, blue) rising from open potion bottles and the bubbling cauldron
Volumetric light shafts: pale daylight beams from high windows made visible by the smoky atmosphere
